descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][color=#00ffff] This is my third installment to my creepy mixed race fetish. Selthar is a Orc/Khajiit race from afar. After the Dragonborn killed the evil Alduin the citizens of Tamriel got a tad bit bored and thus strange offspring began to appear. Now years later people are seeing strange warriors come in all flavors to help fight any battle they can! Enjoy and thumbs up if you like her! Now...hmm..what to create next as a mixed race? lol
[/color]
[u][color=#00ffff]BUG FIX[/color][color=#ffff00]:[/color][/u][color=#ffff00] There seems to be a bug with followers in Skyrim in which you unequip them and they revert back to a lame bow and arrow and or dismiss them and they revert back. So I fixed this so that she will only use her default daggers unless you give her other weapons.

[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2tBkk][/url]

[/color][u][color=#ffff00]LOCATION:[/color][/u][color=#00ffff]Broken Helm Hollow: It is located on the eastern face of the small peak southeast of Riften near the large waterfall. Had to make it a tad harder this time (fighting a couple bandits :p) however, she's not hard to find. (COC CODE: BrokenHelmHollowExterior01)
[/color]
[/size][/b][size=4][b][size=4][u][color=#00ffff]STATS:[/color][/u][color=#ffff00]Orc/Khajiit Race
Height: 0.95
Weight 50
Voice: FemaleYoungEager
Marriageable
[/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=4][u][color=#ffff00]EQUIPMENT SCORE MULTS:[/color] [/u][/size][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=4](What she will use more or less of in combat):[/size][/color][/b][size=4][color=#00ffff][b]Melee 3.20, Magic 2.40, Ranged 1.00, Shout 1.00, Staff 1.00, Unarmed 1.00 

[/b][/color][/size][b][size=4][u][color=#00ffff]ESSENTIAL:[/color][/u][color=#ffff00] (I like to keep my creations around for awile.)

[/color][/size][/b][b][size=4][u][color=#ffff00]SPELL'S:[/color]
[/u][/size][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=4]Firebolt 
[/size][/color][/b][b][size=4][color=#00ffff]Frostbite
[/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=4][u][color=#00ffff]SKILLS/PERKS:[/color][/u] [color=#ffff00]Conjuration-100, Illusion-100, Restoration-100, Destruction-100, Block-100, Two-Handed-100, One-Handed-100 [/color]

[/size][/b][b][size=4][u][color=#ffff00]ITEMS:[/color][/u][color=#00ffff] (2) Enchanted Daedric Dagger's Of Fire, Bandit Mage Outfit[/color]

[/size][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=4][u]REQUIREMENTS:
[/u][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ffff00][size=4]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended
[/size][/color][/b][b][size=4][color=#ffff00]HDT Physics Extensions[/color]

[/size][/b][b][size=4][u][color=#ffff00]INSTALLATION: [/color]
[/u][/size][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=4]Use NMM or manual to your liking.[/size][/color][/b][/size][b][size=4]

[u][color=#00ffff]CREDITS:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make A Follower Kit MAFK: By Ashes2Asherz (Can create a follower by hand but I'm lazy and this SUPER HELPS!)

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?]Nif Merge: By Turulo (Great little tool!) [/url] [url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/]NifSkope (A great tool for viewing meshes before adding them in CK and other neat stuff)

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4804/?]BSA Unpacker: By Wookie[/url]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit 3.2: By ElminsterAU (For saving me from many, many CTD's and other crap)

Nexus for Nexus Mod Manager and everything else they do!Folgers for keeping me alive enough to create this mod! 

[u]RECOMMENDED[/u]: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks: By Dheuster (MANY,many tweaks for Followers including changing outfits)

[/url]The Manipulator (Google This) can set followers essential and other neat stuff.[/size][/color]
author: shrinkydink67
